name: rabuta-berry
effect: No effect; only useful for planting and cooking.
short_effect: Used for creating PokéBlocks and Poffins.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Used to make Pokéblocks that will enhance your Cleverness, this Berry is rare in other regions.
